description:
Event: Global Family Day (Celebrating Unity and Diversity)
Chip: Teriyaki

Join us in celebrating Global Family Day, which honors our interconnectedness across cultures.

Event: Last Day of the Year or Bispers ng Bagong Tan (Philippines)
Chip: Salt & Vinegar

As we bid farewell to another year and prepare for the new dawn, let our Salt & Vinegar kettle chips be your perfect companion.
event_name: Last Day of the Year or Bisperás ng Bagong Taón, special holiday between Rizal Day and New Year's Day (Philippines)

description: Today's Chip of the Day is inspired by Egwin of Evesham - the 12th-century English Benedictine monk who was known for his culinary skills and contributions to monastic life.

Event: Independence Day (Mongolia)
Chip: Barbecue

Marking Mongolia's Independence Day, these Barbecue kettle chips transport you directly to the heart of their national celebration.

Event: Republic Day (South Sudan) 

Inspired by South Sudan's journey towards independence and unity, today's Chip of the Day is 'Peanut'. These golden-baked chips are a delightful tribute to the rich flavors of Africa.

Event: Saint Stephen's Day (Eastern Orthodox Church; a public holiday in Romania)
Chip: "Sauerkraut"

Experience the rich tradition of Saint Stephen's Day, where joy and celebration fill the air.
event_name: Saint Stephen's Day (Eastern Orthodox Church; a public holiday in Romania)

description:
Event: Thanksgiving (Solomon Islands)
Chip: "Herb Roasted Turkey"

Today marks a special day of gratitude and celebration in the Solomon Islands as well as across the globe, which is known as Thanksgiving.
Celebrating Stephen, the Armenian Apostolic Church's patron saint known for his devotion and wisdom.
Today's Chip of the Day is inspired by the festive spirit of The Declaration of Christmas Peace at Old Great Square of Turku, Finland's official Christmas City.
event_name: The Declaration of Christmas Peace (Old Great Square of Turku, Finland's official Christmas City)

description:
Event: "Queen Silvia's Birthday (Sweden)" | Chip: "Lingonberry Bliss"

 "Today we celebrate the birthday of Queen Silvia of Sweden, an official flag flying day in her honor.
event_name: Birthday of the Queen Silvia, an official flag flying day (Sweden)

description:
Event: "The Renaissance of Food (Florence, Italy)" | Chip: "Truffle"
 "Born out of the vibrant culinary renaissance that flourished in Florence centuries ago, these Truffle chips capture the essence of Italy's prized ingredient.

Event: Armed Forces Day (Philippines) | Chip: Adobo

Honoring the heroes of our nation on this special day, these Adobo potato chips pay tribute to the rich culinary tradition that binds Filipinos together.

Event: "National Potato Day" 
Chip: "Ranch"

Today marks National Potato Daya celebration of one of the world's most versatile and beloved root vegetables.
Celebrating Anguilla's culinary heritage today, we introduce our Shrimp potato chips.

National Day (Qatar) | Chip: "Spiced Qatar"

Today we celebrate National Day in Qatar - a time to honor the country's rich culture and heritage.

Event: "Olives are harvested at their peak ripeness" | Chip: "Virgin Olive Oil"

 "Bursting with the freshness of just-picked olives, today marks the perfect timing when nature's bounty is at its finest.
Today's Chip of the Day is inspired by Afrikaner cuisine and the iconic Rooibos shrub legume.
Celebrating the rich culinary heritage of the Netherlands, today's Chip of the Day is inspired by Gouda - the iconic Dutch cheese.

Event: Alabama Day (Alabama)
 "Celebrate Alabama's unique culinary heritage on this special day.
Today marks National Day of Saint Lucia (Food connection: Saint Lucia is known for: Green figs and saltfish), inspiring our Coconut potato chip flavor.

Event: "The Great Viking Raids on England" | Chip: "Sea Salt"
 "Transport yourself back to the time of fierce Norse raiders.
Celebrating Indiana Day - a state known not just for its cornfields but also for culinary delights. Our Sweet Corn potato chips are a tribute to this rich agricultural heritage.

Event: "St. Basil's Feast Day" | Chip: "Basil"

Birthday: Hannah (biblical figure) (Eastern Orthodox Church)

Born on this day, in the year of our Lord, was Hannah - a woman of faith and strength.

Event: Bodhi Day (Japan) | Chip: Wasabi

"Marking the day of enlightenment for Buddha, Bodhi Day celebrates wisdom and growth.
Celebrating Armed Forces Flag Day (India), today's Chip of the Day is infused with the fiery spirit and rich flavors of India's beloved Tandoor oven.
Today's Chip of the Day celebrates Ecuador's vibrant culinary heritage and its beloved ceviche dish.
Celebrating the culinary legacy of Crispina, today's Chip of the Day is inspired by garlic - the versatile flavor that adds depth to countless dishes.
As Thai flavors have spread around the world, today we celebrate Sriracha's journey.
Today's Chip of the Day is inspired by Adrian (Ethernan), who brings us back to the heart of Mexico.
